title: Magical★Travel Boy
original_name: マジカル ★ トラベル BOY
sinopse:
A collection of four stories.

1. Magical Travel Boy (ch1-3): an alien boy with magical powers becomes lost while on a school excursion to planet Earth. A local street magician takes him in, but he has a dangerous secret of his own.

2. Love Hospital (ch4): a chatty student is sent to hospital with a broken leg. The patient in the adjacent bed is a student as well, yet refuses to talk to anyone at all.

3. Suki de Warui ka!! [Wrong to Like You!!] (ch5): a shy high school student is a closet otaku who loves drawing manga based on his favorite shows. One day he is horrified when another student happens to see the artwork in his notebook.

4. Foul na Kankei (ch6)

(from B-U)
